subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which historical monument in Rajasthan was built by Maharaja Surajmal?
question_hi: राजस्थान में महाराजा सुराजमाल ने किस भवन बनाया है ?
explanation_en: Hawa Mahal, also known as the Palace of Winds, was built by Maharaja Pratap Singh of Amber.
explanation_hi: हावा महाल, अमेर के प्रतिमान सिंग के लेन के मात्रा के Palaces mein बना है।
